items.text: soft hands this time for the length ball on the pads, worked behind square on leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: pitched up and driven just wide of cover for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: not much room outside off, he punches it straight to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: Shakib strays with the line and pitches it towards the pads, Shenwari sweeps it away with some power behind square on the leg side for a four
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, FOUR runs

items.text: uses hard hands again and slams a drive through the covers to keep strike
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.preText: Seventh bowler of the day. It's Mominul
items.text: pitched up and driven straight to cover
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Samiullah Shinwari, no run
Mominul Haque to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: flighted and pitched up again, he drills that with some power straight to cover where the ball deflects off the fielder to concede a single
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: slightly slow on the pads, nudged to midwicket for one
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: another full delivery to Shenwari, driven down to long off for one more
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Samiullah Shinwari, 1 run

items.text: sweeps for a top edge, he hasn't quite timed that poor delivery outside leg and he gets four to reach his half-century
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Hashmatullah Shahidi, FOUR runs

items.text: quick and flat outside off, he lets it go
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: length delivery on the off stump, punched straight to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: driven straight to cover this time and the fielder throws it back quickly to the keeper
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: fourth dot in a row as the line stifles the batsmen
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: another tight line on off stump, driven straight to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: plays the wrong line a little, and gets an inside edge back to the bowler. It's a maiden from Shakib
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: on the pads and it's flicked straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: another length delivery on the pads, he can't clear midwicket again
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: slams it off the back foot from outside off, cover dives to his right and gets a hand to it but can't hold on
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: slow through the air around off, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: hint of room but Shenwari finds cover again
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Samiullah Shinwari, no run

items.text: finally gets a shorter ball and he cuts it to deep point
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Samiullah Shinwari, 2 runs

items.preText: Shakib over the wicket to Shahidi. Afghanistan losing some momentum here
items.text: helps the ball with the turn to leg for one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: goes for the big shot and he misses it completely! Shenwari was eating up too many deliveries against the spinners. He wants to release the pressure by trying to loft this length ball on off to the leg side but misses the line and the ball goes with the angle to knock over middle
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Samiullah Shinwari, OUT

dismissal.text: Samiullah Shinwari  b Shakib Al Hasan 18 (31b 1x4 0x6) SR: 58.06
